name: Pressure Within
description:
The core of every zombie game is, of course, taking out zombies. But, the essence of our fears does not come from the zombies themselves. It comes from a simple question we all put to the back of our minds for safety. When is it safe to take a number two? Daylight? Before nightfall? Perhaps when you think it is safe and quiet you will take to the bushes. Find a nice outhouse? Wrong. Nowhere is safe.

Experience a nightmarish world where you race against the clock to gain access to the last working lavatory. You'll need to collect ammo and weaponry along the way if you wish to survive. Maintain your bowel pressure by finding, or purchasing, the necessities for quick relief.

Learn your surroundings and decipher terrible riddles to reclaim your sacred throne of safety.

Sure, zombies are an easy kill. So test yourself in harder difficulties containing tougher foes. Creatures of nightmares.



The core of the game is in its final stages.
Additional game modes, difficulties, and new weaponry are currently in development.
